overview: Tina and Anita are publishers of Femina. A monthly magazine featuring equality amongst the sexes. Tina defends her views while Anita is a crusader. Men resent ideology. Pyan a minibus diver manages to change Tinaâ€™s extreme views. Tina is regarded as a traitor to the women and all special privileges that have extended to her are withdrawn. This put her in a spot.
tagline: Bila Wanita Berkuasa [When Women In Power]
title: Femina
